displayModeSubtitle: Choose how {{appName}} looks. Your preference will be saved for your next visit.
languageSubtitle: Choose the language for the application interface.
installAppSubtitle: Get a native-like experience by installing our app on your device.
apiKeyUpdateSuccess: API Key updated and verified successfully!
apiKeyUpdateError: Failed to update API Key. Please ensure it is correct.
addKeyToViewAccount: Please add your API key in the account settings to view account details.
apiKeySignInMessage: You are signed in using an API key, which has limited access to account settings.
logoutDescription: End your current session and return to the login screen.
andRegister: and register for a full account.
changePasswordSubtitle: Update your password for better security.
passwordUpdateError: Failed to update password. Please check your current password.
embedDashboardSubtitle: Copy and paste this HTML snippet into your website or application to embed a live view of your {{appName}} dashboard.
embedWarning: This embed code contains your API key. Only use it on secure websites you trust.
embedApiKeyMissing: API Key is missing from the URL. Cannot display embeddable content.
whitelabelInfo: Interested in a whitelabel version of our platform or need a custom setup on your own infrastructure? We offer solutions tailored to your brand and technical requirements.
apiKeyHiddenForSecurity: Your API key is hidden for security. Reveal to view or copy.
apiKeyWarning: Warning: Treat your API key like a password. Do not share it publicly.
confirmApiKeyUpdateBody: Are you sure you want to replace your current API key? This action is irreversible and the old key will be lost.
invalidApiKey: The provided API Key is invalid or could not be verified.
exploreApiDesc: Integrate MegaMail's powerful sending capabilities into your own applications, websites, or services. Our robust API allows you to send emails, manage contacts, view statistics, and much more programmatically.
iUnderstandTheRisks: I understand the security risks and wish to proceed.
embedFeatureInfoBody: This feature allows you to embed a live view of your dashboard or statistics on your own website. Please be aware of the security implications before generating the code.
embedFeatureSecurityNotice: Generating an embed code will expose your API key. This is a security risk. Only use this feature if you understand and accept the risks involved. It should only be used on trusted, private websites.
